item.title: Jodie Foster Like You’ve Never Seen (or Heard) Her Before
item.description: In her latest film, the two-time Oscar winner does one of the few things she’s never dared try onscreen: speak French.

item.title: Jonathan Kaplan, Director of ‘The Accused’ and ‘ER,’ Dies at 77
item.description: The nephew of Van Heflin also helmed ‘Love Field,’ ‘Truck Turner,’ ‘Over the Edge,’ ‘Bad Girls,’ ‘Immediate Family’ and other admired films.

item.title: Jonathan Kaplan, Director of ‘The Accused’ and ‘ER,’ Dies at 77
item.description: The nephew of Van Heflin also helmed ‘Love Field,’ ‘Truck Turner,’ ‘Over the Edge,’ ‘Bad Girls,’ ‘Immediate Family’ and other admired films.

item.title: Guillermo del Toro, Jodie Foster to Receive Tribute Awards at Toronto Film Festival
item.description: The first wave of honorees for the Sept. 7 gala fundraiser includes Japanese director Hikari and ‘Squid Game’ star Lee Byung-hun.

item.title: Guillermo del Toro, Jodie Foster to Receive Tribute Awards at Toronto Film Festival
item.description: The first wave of honorees for the Sept. 7 gala fundraiser includes Japanese director Hikari and ‘Squid Game’ star Lee Byung-hun.
